ValidationRule.description: When User Select TT of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection then not entering data in Cheque/DD No.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Mode__c , 'TT') , ISPICKVAL( Mode_Selection__c,'Rupees') , ISBLANK( Cheque_DD__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Selecting TT of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection Pick List,Cheque/DD No. cann't be blank
